actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to accelerate the effective date of the recently enacted cost-of-living increase in social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Accelerates the effective date of the increase in social security benefits under Public Law 93-66, from May 1974 to December 1973.

titles.title: A bill to accelerate the effective date of the recently enacted cost-of-living increase in social security benefits.
